Interfaces

Interface CustomerLounge

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Lounge

    public interface CustomerLounge
    Interface for Customer for the use of the Lounge

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void enterCustomerQueue(int customerId, boolean payment)
      Customer enters queue to be attended by the Manager.
      void exitLounge(int customerId)
      Exit Lounge

      Get replacement car key.

      Customer gives Manager his/hers car key.

    • Method Detail

      • enterCustomerQueue

        void enterCustomerQueue(int customerId,
                        boolean payment)
        Customer enters queue to be attended by the Manager.
        Parameters:
        customerId - - Id of the customer to be attended
        payment - - type of attendance. (true/false) Pay for repair/Request repair.

      • getReplacementCarKey

        int getReplacementCarKey(int customerId)
        Get replacement car key.
        Parameters:
        customerId - - ID of the client who needs the replacement car.
        Returns:
        the key of the replacement car.

      • returnReplacementCarKey

        void returnReplacementCarKey(int key,
                             int customerId)
        Return Replacement car key. Customer with the need of a replacement car invokes this method.
        Parameters:
        key - - Key of the replacement car key.
        customerId - ID of the current Customer returning the replacement car key

      • exitLounge

        void exitLounge(int customerId)
        Exit Lounge
        Parameters:
        customerId - - Id of the customer who will exit the lounge

      • giveManagerCarKey

        void giveManagerCarKey(int customerId,
                       int key)
        Customer gives Manager his/hers car key.
        Parameters:
        key - - Customer's car key.
        customerId - current Customer giving their car key

      • payForTheService

        int payForTheService(int customerId)
        Customer pays for the service and retrieves the keys of his/her car.
        Parameters:
        customerId - - ID of the customer.
        Returns:
        the Customer's car key.
